parameter.name: queueName
parameter.description: The name of the new queue

parameter.name: attributeEntries
parameter.description: A map of attributes with their corresponding values. The value should be a string in JSON format. Eg: {'my_attribute_name_1': {'DataType': 'String','StringValue': 'my_attribute_value_1' }}

parameter.name: tags
parameter.description: The cost allocation tags to the specified Amazon SQS queue. Eg: {QueueType: Testing}

parameter.name: apiCallTimeout
parameter.description: The amount of time(In Seconds) to allow the client to complete the execution of an API call

parameter.name: apiCallAttemptTimeout
parameter.description: The amount of time(In Seconds) to wait for the http request to complete before giving up and timing out
